full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/30/2023 MAHARASHTRA 3RS50nP PINDIAN CRIRI BRITH GREAT THERE E.RUPEES HR- FIFTY NAYE PAISE (UU No. Court of Smart Causes, 30 Bonisty Dated 00 as 23 AUG 1966 ISSUED to DEPUTY REGISTANT K.m. Non-Judicial Stam,: paper of Lif. Stamp Allen Oaths Act 1878 MAGISTRATES MARY Affidavit I, Chunilal Prajaram Bhatt aged 68 now residing at D.35 Ganesh Baug, 208 Vincent Road, Matunga, Bombay 19, solemnly affirm and say as follows : Branch Manager 1. I am a citizen of Republic of India. I am a Director Madrast Aglen of Jeewanlal (1929) Ltd. having its officesat Bombay & Calcutta, 2. I belong to Junagadh in the State of Gujrat which is my native place. I know one Gulabshankar Chhotalal Desai of Junagadh now deceased. I know his wife Prabhavati alias Maniben I also know their two sons Bhagwantrai Gulabshankar Desai and Rajendra Gulabshankar Desai. My house and house of deceased Gulabshankar Desai are situated near to each other in Panchhatadi area of Junagadh. I know deceased since childhood till his death 3. I know that said Bhagwantrai and Rajendra two sons of Gulabshankar Chhotalal Desai were born to their mother Prabhavati bai alias Manibai. They are real brothers.
